class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


Spectrogram Reading 
You need to have a basic understanding of phonetics. 
Prerequisites: LING 210 or any language focused phonetics class such as French phonetics or Spanish phonetics.
course_description:
Students study, read, and write on a topic under the direction or supervision of a faculty
member. Permission of the department and a supervising faculty member is required.
